definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: In other words, look at the entire life cyle.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，要考虑到整个生命周期。

sentences.english: Development governance encompasses the software development lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 开发治理围绕着软件开发生命周期。

sentences.english: Make? C designs that allow easy, cost-effective disassembly and re-use of parts at end of life.
sentences.chinese: 低成本，容易拆解，在生命周期结束零件可重新利用。

sentences.english: Each manager is responsible for creating and managing the life cycle of the components they create.
sentences.chinese: 每种管理器都负责创建和管理所创建组件的生命周期。

sentences.english: Life-cycle process, various types of transferase activity has Change fluctuated.
sentences.chinese: 生命周期过程中，各式转移酶活性有增减。

sentences.english: They define lifecycle methods setup and cleanup.
sentences.chinese: 它们定义了生命周期方法的设置和清除。

sentences.english: The bug attains different states in the life cycle.
sentences.chinese: 缺陷在其生命周期中会处于许多不同的状态。

sentences.english: The pool has the same duration of the application's lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 该对象池与应用程序拥有相同的生命周期。

sentences.english: Both Lifecycles and policies are customisable
sentences.chinese: 两个生命周期和策略都可以定制。

sentences.english: This then relates back to the SOA governance lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 那么这又回到了SOA治理的生命周期。

sentences.english: The models for the system have continued usefulness for the life of the software.
sentences.chinese: 为系统开发的模型对整个软件生命周期都有用。

sentences.english: To do this task, you implement methods in the lifecycle interface.
sentences.chinese: 要完成这个任务，需要在生命周期接口中实现方法。

sentences.english: Assessment can be performed at any time of the development lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 在开发生命周期的任何时候都可以进行评估。

sentences.english: The other components address particular aspects of the software development lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 其他组件处理软件开发生命周期的特定方面。

sentences.english: They reproduce either sexually or asexually, and have life cycles that range from simple to complex.
sentences.chinese: 进行有性或无性繁殖，并具有单一到复杂的生命周期。

sentences.english: As opposed to a subordinate, later life-cycle activity.
sentences.chinese: 与认为它是次要的，生命周期晚期的活动的观点不同。

definition: development cycle/development period/also written 開發週期|开发周期
industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
